title: Bug 4971 - Unexpected Outcome in 'Copy Package'
description: This bug report addresses an issue with the 'copy package' operation in version 2031. The problem is located within the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' component of 'jdt.ui'.
OB: The report lacks a clear description of the observed behavior, which is essential for a complete bug report.
EB: The expected behavior should involve the 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' component, but the report does not provide details to clarify this.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new project named 'xxx'.
2. In the package viewer, select a package within project 'A'.
3. Right-click to open the context menu and select 'copy'.
